experience: You and Michael both know Fred Yu, Mark Castrovinci, and 19 others

As a part of the preferred RPO provider for Cobham, I manage the recruitment lifecycle and associated projects for one of Cobham's principal operating locations across all disciplines including Engineering, Procurement, Finance, HR and Operations with the bulk of my time spent on delivering niche engineering candidates. Cobham's values of Trust, Talent and Technology have driven us from our launch in 1934 by Sir Alan Cobham, an aviation innovator, to becoming a global leader in state-of-the-art aerospace and defense systems. And it’s the insights of our innovators today that will secure our collective future. Innovators like you.

Atos, an international leader in digital services, today announced it has been named a Top 10  Outsourcing Service Provider in two categories by Information Services Group (ISG), a leading technology insights, market intelligence and advisory services company.As a Lead Sourcing Specialist I am responsible for sourcing, screening, and presenting IT Technical and infrastructure candidates to Atos as an integral component in building their presence across the US.

Orion Health is a global, independently owned eHealth software company with proven experience in delivering interoperable, connected solutions for healthcare facilities, organizations and regions.Responsible for sourcing, screening, and presenting IT Technical and infrastructure candidates to Orion Health Care as an integral component in building their presence across the US.

Responsible for recruiting and placement of top talent within the healthcare industry. Solicited new and existing clients nationwide
Responsible for full cycle recruiting and placement of top talent for various position that include, territory sales, account management, customer service, logistics and management roles.

Responsible for recruiting and placement of top talent within the healthcare industry for travel contracts nationwide. Positions included all Nursing specialties, Allied (including lab and rehab) and RN Management roles
